modName: Noldorian Divine Huntress - UNP CBBE standalone
summary: Noldorian Divine Huntress adds a unique and highly detailed standalone female armour for UNP and CBBE. It is a sexy/skimpy armour but still does not feel out of place and makes your female character really stand out.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qKrZMl.jpg[/IMG]

About the Mod

Noldorian Divine Huntress provides a new, unique and highly detailed standalone female armour based on meshes by killerkeo and asianboy345. This is a sexy/skimpy armour, but it still does not feel out of place due to its design and materials and makes your female character really stand out.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod.

It is a heavy armour set that can be crafted under the steel category at any forge and that is fully temperable and upgradeable.

Now available :

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKWs8l.jpg[/IMG]


Video reviews

[youtube]YQnGR40We4c[/youtube]
Skyrim Mod spotlight by BDMods

[youtube]lrIikzzPklM[/youtube]
Skyrim Mod highlight by jamslambs


Required mods

No additional mods are required, since this is a standalone armour which includes everything needed.


Installation

Download ONE of the Noldorian Divine Huntress variants - depending on which body replacer mod you use - and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override. Installation via Nexus Mod Manager should work too. Make sure that the " DHuntress.esp " is activated.

The Christmas Edition is fully standalone and can be used alongside the main file.

For the optional colour variants ONE of the main files is required.

1. Download ONE of the Main Files
2. Download the Optional File and say yes when being asked to overwrite


Un- installation

Un-install via NMM or de-activate the " DHuntress.esp " and delete the "huntress" folders in your "textures" AND "meshes" subfolders of your main Skyrim Data folder.


Compatibility

This mod simply adds a new armour set to the game and should not conflict with anything, except the Divine Huntress sets by killerkeo and asianboy345.

Credits

Credits go to...

- killerkeo for the CBBE meshes -> check out this great [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654]armour mod[/url]
- asianboy345 for the UNP meshes
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of beta testers :

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3421798]bassbil[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1784046]netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4243482]schmoops9[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/759307]VictoriaG[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/351527]TomAraya[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072]zzjay[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4348538]ibanez85[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/705688]Seren4xx[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1845169]wraith132[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/905814]Rosendaemonin[/url]

The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. THANK YOU SO MUCH! Special thanks go to netherwalk since he inspired me to re-do this beautiful armour set.

Special thanks go to TomAraya and Seren4xx for their help with the game implementation of the Christmas Edition!

Permissions

You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.


Gallery

Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the "Credits" section. Enjoy it!

Author's note :

If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation, leave a comment or load up a picture - I'd be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
